channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Tika

item.title: CVE-2018-1339|2024-09-16T17:14:39.308Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20tika
item.description: A carefully crafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop in Apache Tika's ChmParser in versions of Apache Tika before 1.18.
